articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Friends co-creator admits she 'didn't do enough' to encourage diversity - Sky News
articles.description: Marta Kauffman, who co-created Friends with David Crane, has addressed the lack of diversity in the show at a TV festival.

articles.title: Bonnie Pointer of The Pointer Sisters dies aged 69 - ITV News
articles.description:
Singer Bonnie Pointer, best known as a member of the Grammy-winning group The Pointer Sisters, has died at the age of 69.

She died on Monday, according to her sister and fellow singer, Anita. 

No cause of death was revealed.

The Pointer Sisters had well-kn…
articles.content:

articles.author: Emmeline Saunders, Thomas Lynch
articles.title: GMB's Alex Beresford opens up about secret split from wife Natalia - Bristol Live
articles.description: The ITV weather presenter revealed he and his wife separated two weeks before lockdown
articles.content:
Good Morning Britain's Alex Beresford has opened up about his secret split from wife Natalia Natkaniec.
